channel.title: PAYING for webclient (and couple other things)
channel.description:
Okay everyone, before you read this, note that I am paying $40 USD via paypal. (Or something else, but paypal is best.) Or just $25 for the webclient itself. Yes, I will pay when it's done. Here's the couple of things I need:
1. Working Webclient (Will provide my client files if job accepted) 2. Register via website and have it link to in game and make a file there 3. MySQL high score list. 4. And for a little extra maybe, anything else you can think of, just ask me.
So thanks a lot, and post here if you want the job. :D
P.S.: Any assholes who want to say "Do it yourself, stupid.", save your time. I don't want to hear it, unless you want to get into a fight. Thank you. ;)

item.title: PAYING for webclient (and couple other things)
item.dc:creator: @jessica124 jessica124
item.description:
@jessica124 wrote:

The TOS you agreed to has a section saying no buying or selling.

Read full topic

H20wnage:

i could provide web hosting and build a high score data base but i can not really help on the web client thing

Cool, if you really want to, tell me. I’ll go ahead and PM you.

[quote=“Ownedk, post:10, topic:183940”]Lol, thanks bud.
Do It Yourself, Stupid ;D[/quote]
